channel.title: Runescape plain
channel.description:
I was wondering if there was anywhere I could find a basic source/client of Runescape 317 exactly like the base game. Sure there will be bugs but where can I find a source that you spawn in lumbridge, shops are in the the buildings where they are supposed to be, that kind if thing...
Before people start flaming "Use the search feature", I would use it if I knew how to word this where a search device could find it. But right now I just know of what I'm looking for not what it is called....

@Mountainbit wrote:

I saw two like a few days ago.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape plain

He just wants a base that starts in Lumbridge and has a few shops in the right place, not a complete remake.

item.title: Runescape plain
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

runewings317:

Heres a crazy though… We can always download the source, wipe everything off and add the things we want ourselves. Crazy idea ain’t?

You know what else is crazy? Actually reading the board titles and posting a thread in the correct section!
Imagine if someone actually did that? that’d be soooooo nuts.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Wintzert wrote:

Any idea how many NPCs are in 317? I’m sure somebody has already done it and there is no reason in doing it over and over. If you don’t know of one then you aren’t contributing now are you? Just saying the same basic thing that everybody says and nobody really cares…
